item.title: Architecture
item.description: opaal opaal is a distributed/parallel (discrete time) model checker for networks of timed automata implemented in Python using MPI. opaal is designed to be easily extendible, such that different approaches can be prototyped quickly. item.title: opaal + LTSmin
item.description: Setup Instructions This guide is for installing opaal+LTSmin and have been tested on Ubuntu 12.04 and Ubuntu 14.04 but have also been confirmed to work on Arch Linux and Mac OS X - however you will have to identify the needed software packages yourself on those platforms. The installation of opaal+LTSmin is automated so users simply need to download and run a bash script.
